headline: McDonald’s Rival Jollibee Plans US Listing for Global Business
summary: Jollibee Foods Corporation International would include all of the company’s businesses outside its home market, the company said in a statement filed to the Philippine Stock Exchange, where its Philippine operations will remain listed.  The spinoff would allow investors to value the “stable, cash-generative Philippine business separately from the higher-growth but more volatile international operations,” COL Financial Group analyst Rachelle Biacora said in a note.  Jollibee shareholders would receive a number of shares in the international business equal to their company holdings at the time of the listing, the company said.
